_UPRUsBtn19rn-WQJV5GVA.text: A lovely cafe on the corner with a comfortable and welcoming ambiance.  The owner is from Greece and knows how to prepare authentic dishes.  The staff are friendly and knowledgeable and able to provide guidance to those who do not know what they want.  The food was some of the best I have had outside of a Greek families home.  That is just what the place is like, dinning with a family.  We had a sampling of dishes and all of them were delicious but the desserts where outstanding!  Next time we are in Edinburgh we will be coming here.

photos.caption: Photo of Spitaki - Edinburgh, United Kingdom

CC-PWhJm9t98BUMe9O3R4A.text: Delicious and fresh Greek food with great service. My wine was also very good!

JJnWUdqBanA4spSW-qcyUA.text: A lovely little restaurant that has just opened around the corner from my flat. It's very popular just now, so remember to book. The food is very tasty and reasonably priced. The atmosphere is relaxed and friendly, with great staff. We've been going sometimes several times a week!
